page.title: 19Linmear Middle School
page.content: Limear is a Middle School for children between the ages of{9 and 13. The school is named Linmear because Linmear means field of lime trees and the school was built,on what used to be,a field of lime trees. The school has its own assembly hall ,design centre,gymnasium,playground and a field of around 6 acres. The school has{4 centres}for the 4 years. Various clubs are organised at lunch-times and after school.There are also discos,both supervised by staff. The school has school teams which compete against other school teams at various sports. The school has four groups of pupils called{'houses'.}The houses compete against one another for trophies each year.The trophies include ones for football and rugby.
